opennlp.ccg.synsem
Class LexLogProbFeatureExtractor

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.synsem.LexLogProbFeatureExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatureExtractor, SignScorer
public class LexLogProbFeatureExtractor
extends Object
implements FeatureExtractor, SignScorer

A class for extracting total lexical log probabilities from a supertagger as a feature. The class may also be used as a sign scorer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $, $Date: 2009/11/01 22:26:29 $
Author:
Michael White
